Wow.. I never had a problem with a torrent before. I usually see speeds of between 1.5MB/s and 2.5MB/s and higher. This torrent has been chugging along at 1.7kB/s and slower. It almost seems stuck at 34% for a couple of days now. What is going on with this torrent?
I agree... this torrent doesnt seem to be working properly.
It isn't being seeded. We are stuck at 34.5% for days now. That's too bad. I was looking forward to this release.
I think I'm done here.
i'll seed

I have done absolutely nothing wrong; I have provided quality HD movies for years, and this is the thanks I get. It's pathetic.

What they don't seeeem to realize is that I'm not the one losing out here.

Jonny, you have my sympathies. At work, I'm the guy who ends up getting the shit despite the fact that I put the most work in. It's all taken for granted. So, I understand your frustrtion. Regardless if you return or not, thank you for ALL of your quality HD releases. So many of them were obscure classics that I couldn't find anywhere else. I couldn't have completed by Bogey collection without you. All I'm missing from my classics collection is On the Waterfront. I'll find it someday. Thanks for everything, Jonny!

Since I'm here, I do have a question. Why do some blu-ray rips seem to have such an excessive grain effect to them? Examples being the HD releases of 21 Grams and Black Swan. Obviously, it is intentional or unavoidable in some cases (i.e. 28 Days Later) but for the remainder, the inconsistency is beyond my understanding. Could anyone explain this to me? Thank you!

Thanks!!!
